title: AAAOM
author: Irene Silvernail
description: Serving the profession of Acupuncture and Oriental Medicine
cleaned_text: January 2022 These last two years have been difficult for most of us and our profession. However as many are familiar, it is not simply the strong survive, it's those who adapt and work together. We are and continue to be the VOICE OF THE PROFESSION and are here for you, each one of you. United we Stand, divided we fall and fail. Stay tuned! The AAAOM is the oldest national membership organization of acupuncture and Oriental medicine (AOM) practitioners and supporters that serves to advance the profession and practice of AOM. The mission of the AAAOM is to support our members and the AOM community through education, occupational resources and legislative advocacy in our commitment to facilitate access to the highest quality of healthcare in the United States.
